alert.note: Alert for Collin; Fannin; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 3:24PM CDT until November 04 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HUNT...SOUTHEASTERN COLLIN AND FANNIN COUNTIES... At 324 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Lake Bonham to Bonham to Celeste to near Farmersville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bonham, Farmersville, Leonard, Honey Grove, Wolfe City, Celeste, Ector, Dodd City, Ravenna, Bonham State Park, Lake Bonham, Merit, Randolph, Crockett Lake, Coffee Mill Lake, Boyd, Nevada, Josephine, Ladonia and Bailey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
